text: The 2010–11 season was Falkirk's first season back in the Scottish First Division, having been relegated from the Scottish Premier League at the end of season 2009–10. Falkirk also competed in the Challenge Cup, League Cup and the Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===First Division=== ===Scottish Challenge Cup=== ===Scottish League Cup=== ===Scottish Cup=== ==Squad== ==League table== ==References== Category:Falkirk F.C. seasons Falkirk
title: 2010–11 Falkirk F.C. season
